meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Meeting in Washington, women's groups appealed to younger members and sought to organize against efforts to roll back affirmative-action programs. Page A10.
The members of the music group TLC are filing for bankruptcy protection. Their record label and manager contend the women are just trying to terminate their contract. Page D1.
Old Faithful, the geyser in Yellowstone National Park that was for years a national icon of dependability, is no longer so predictable in its eruptions. Page A10.
Mirroring a proposal by Republicans in Congress, Governor Pataki wants to distribute state aid through block grants. The plan could have a larger impact than his cuts. Page B1.
Audrey Meadows, whose portrayal of Jackie Gleason's long-suffering working-class wife made her a television icon, was 71. Page D10.
